revised_title: Nucleocytoplasmic Interactions and Their Role in Morphogenesis
tldr: This lecture discusses the importance of nucleocytoplasmic interactions in morphogenesis and cell differentiation. The author reviews various theories and experiments that demonstrate the role of the nucleus and cytoplasm in embryonic development, gene regulation, and cell differentiation. The author also highlights the significance of cytoplasmic organization and the potential role of cytoplasmic organelles, such as mitochondria, in cell differentiation.
